column1: The Pit Room////Praise the BBQ gods
column2: I've found the Texas BBQ I've been searching high and low for! The Pit Room really knows how to do it. We arrived on the earlier side when a line was just beginning to form. Ordered at the counter and was immediately salivating. Got the 2 meat entree that came with 2 sides. Went with burnt ends and pork ribs. While the burnt ends weren't the best I've ever had
column3: the brisket in itself was fantastic. Full of smokey
column4: fatty goodness. The ribs were out of this world! For the sides I opted for cole slaw and elote corn. The corn had a nice kick to it. We ate outside and accompanied our meal with a beer. BBQ perfection!!
